title: CS 564, CS544, & CS541 Lecture Recordings?
body:
Are lectures recorded? I am a part-time master’s student who would like to have the flexibility to miss lectures here and there due to work. 

Profs are Paris Koutris, Tyler Caraza-Harter, and Jelena Diakonikolas, respectively.

I’m not taking all of these the same semester lol
comments: I'm taking the same classes next sem. For 544 and 564 there are lecture recordings and slides online
